tool.name: libraries
tool.command:
parsec libraries create_folder --library_id "$library_id" --folder_name "$folder_name"
#if $description --description "$description" #end if #if $base_folder_id --base_folder_id "$base_folder_id" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: folder_name
param.label: folder_name
param.help: name of the new folder in the data library

param.name: description
param.label: description
param.help: description of the new folder in the data library

param.name: base_folder_id
param.label: base_folder_id
param.help: id of the folder where to create the new folder. If not provided, the root folder will be used

tool.help: Create a folder in a library.
